---
title: "Insert a time-stamp in RStudio"
author: "Adele B"
date: "11/11/2020"
output: html_document
---

In a code chunk or in an R script, insert a timestamp with `ts` + `shift` + `tab`.

First write `ts`:

```{r}
ts
```

Then press `shift` + `tab`:

```{r}
# Wed Nov 11 10:42:54 2020 ------------------------------

```
